name: Get_Question_And_Answer

docs_row.name: Get_Question_And_Answer
docs_row.func_description: Retrieve the question and answer information for a specified hotel.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

q_and_a_pairs.question: Is there a hand shower
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Deluxe Room City View King Bed

q_and_a_pairs.answer: Yes sir, we can provide the same subject to availability at the time of arrival.
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Superior Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hi i have elderly parents and they would arrive in domestic flight and would be travelling on international flight . do you offer early check in around 11am?

q_and_a_pairs.answer: The swimming pool is operational from 06:00 to 22:00 hours daily.
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hello. Do you have swimming pool and is it available to use now? Best regards, Tatiana

observation.average_response_time: This property usually replies within a few days
observation.average_response_time_text: Subject to availability at the property

observation.average_response_time: This property usually replies within a few days

q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Deluxe Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.question: Is there a hand shower
Hi i have elderly parents and they would arrive in domestic flight and would be travelling on international flight . do you offer early check in around 11am?
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Superior Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.answer: Yes sir, we can provide the same subject to availability at the time of arrival.
The swimming pool is operational from 06:00 to 22:00 hours daily.
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hello. Do you have swimming pool and is it available to use now? Best regards, Tatiana

observation.average_response_time_text: Subject to availability at the property

response_summary: The hotel has responded to several guest inquiries with helpful information. One guest asked if the Deluxe Room with a city view and king bed has a hand shower, to which the hotel confirmed with a simple "Yes," receiving 29 positive votes for this answer. Another guest inquired about early check-in around 11 AM for elderly parents traveling between flights, and the hotel responded that they could accommodate the request, subject to availability at the time of arrival. This answer received 27 votes. A third question was about the swimming pool's availability, and the hotel clarified that it operates daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, earning 25 votes. On average, the property replies to questions within a few days, though responses are always subject to availability. Guests are encouraged to ask further questions, as the hotel actively participates in the Q&A feature.
enhance_func_desc: This API is useful for travelers seeking detailed information about hotel amenities and policies. It retrieves Q&A data for a specific hotel, including responses to common guest inquiries about room features, check-in times, and facility availability. Users can view verified answers from the hotel, along with community voting on helpfulness. The hotel ID must be obtained from the SearchHotels or SearchHotelsByCoordinates API.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates endpoints.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data, defaults to English if not specified.

q_and_a_pairs.description: List of question and answer pairs between guests and the hotel

ar_items.description: A single question and answer pair

naive_sentiment.description: A sentiment score indicating the positivity of the answer (higher is more positive)

translated_answer.description: Indicates if the answer has been translated (null means not translated)

hidden.description: Indicates if the Q&A pair is hidden (0 = visible, 1 = hidden)

is_or_could_be_translated.description: Indicates if the Q&A pair could be translated (null means no translation available)

asked_at.description: Timestamp when the question was asked (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

sign_off.description: Optional sign-off message from the hotel (null means no sign-off)

answered_at.description: Timestamp when the answer was provided (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

language.description: Language code for the Q&A pair (e.g., 'en' for English)

answer.description: The hotel's response to the guest's question

answer_time_epoch.description: Unix epoch timestamp when the answer was provided

answered_at_formatted.description: Formatted timestamp of the answer (same as 'answered_at')

question.description: The guest's question to the hotel

room_id.description: Unique identifier for the room type (null if not applicable)

ask_time_epoch.description: Unix epoch timestamp when the question was asked

room_name.description: Name of the room type (null if not applicable)

px_upsort_covid_q_and_a_ds_model__would_.description: A flag indicating relevance to COVID-19 policies (1 = relevant)

translated_question.description: Indicates if the question has been translated (null means not translated)

votes.description: Number of positive votes the answer has received

average_response_time.description: General description of the hotel's average response time

collect_q_and_a_questions.description: Flag indicating if the hotel collects Q&A questions (1 = yes, 0 = no)

hotel_id.description: Unique identifier for the hotel (string representation)

average_response_time_text.description: Additional text about response time (e.g., 'Subject to availability')

opted_out_of_q_and_a.description: Flag indicating if the hotel has opted out of Q&A (0 = participates)

success.description: Indicates if the API request was successful (1 = success)
